# `monthAppPkg`

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `monthAppPkg` is to provide an example app-package (i.e., a shiny application stored in an R package). 

Read more at [mastering-shiny.org](https://mastering-shiny.org/) and [r-pkgs.org](https://r-pkgs.org/)

## Installation

You can install the development version of `monthAppPkg` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mjfrigaard/monthAppPkg")
```
